text: Open the Recruit Agent panel to browse the available agents.
Initiate diplomacy with the Western Roman Empire.
Submit a request for a trade agreement.
Accept or reject the Ostrogothic proposal.
Add Siege Equipment to the construction queue.
Expand the settlement by adding another building slot.
Spend the General's available skill points.
Open the Mercenaries panel and inspect the available list.
Select Olbia to open the Province panel
Left-click on Olbia to select it
Right-click on Olbia to move the army there
Have your governor issue an edict in Dacia.
Select the portrait of a suitable noble or family member to promote.
Left-click on the governorship of Dacia to appoint him there.
Enter the Family Tree panel to appoint a governor.
The Battle of Adrianople will be contested with the armies and setup from the real battle in antiquity. Prepare yourself!
Inspect the points of tactical interest
